site.title: Volodymyr Mokhun | Frontend Developer
site.description: Explore my portfolio as a React and TypeScript Front-End Developer. See projects that showcase practical, effective web solutions.

hero.title: Hey, I'm
hero.titleTooltip: I actually prefer the name <1>Vova </1> as it's easier to pronouce and doesn't sound too formal.
hero.subtitle: a passionate <0>Front-End Developer</0>
hero.description: I aspire to create best products for the web and explore new possibilities of modern technologies I'm a lifelong learner and I'm also a bit obsessed with calisthenics.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.description1: I'm a second-year Computer Science student at the <0>University of Warmia and Mazury</0>. I have experience in developing websites, from simple landing pages to complex web applications. I have also recently obtained <1>Cambridge C1 Advanced Certification</1>.
about.description2: Being exposed to the world of programming at a <0>young age</0>, I don't imagine myself doing anything else as seriously. I'm passionate about web development, especially <0>Front-End</0>. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
about.description3: When I'm not in front of the computer, I like to spend my time <0>working out</0>, <1>watching TV shows and movies</1>, <2>reading</2>, or <3>playing volleyball</3>.
about.name: Name: <0>Volodymyr Mokhun</0>

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: What I use
technologies.description: I qualify myself as a <0>React</0> developer, that's why it is my main tool for building web applications. Mainly I use <1>TypeScript</1> when I can, but I'm also comfortable with <2>JavaScript</2>. <3>For the full list of technologies I use, check out the <4>list to the right</4> and hover over the icons to see technology name. </3>
technologies.resume: I also encourage you to take a look at my resume
